properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO , CONTENT_NO , REPORTED_MEM , MEM_ID , REPORT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') REPORT_DATE , REPORT_STATUS , REPORT_CTG FROM REPORTED JOIN MEM_INFO ON (REPORTED_MEM = MEM_NO) ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT REPORT_NO , NVL(CONTENT_NO, '-') CONTENT_NO , REPORTING_MEM , MEM_ID , REPORT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') REPORT_DATE , REPORT_STATUS , REPORT_CTG FROM REPORTED JOIN MEM_INFO ON (REPORTED_MEM = MEM_NO) WHERE TYPE_BR = ? AND REPORT_DATE BETWEEN ? AND SYSDATE AND REPORT_STATUS = ?
UPDATE REPORTED SET REPORT_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE REPORT_NO = ?

SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_CTG , CONTENT_NO , M.MEM_ID "MEM_ID" , REPORT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') REPORT_DATE , REPORT_STATUS , AR_TITLE , AR_CONTENT , POST_STATUS FROM REPORTED R JOIN MEM_INFO M ON (REPORTED_MEM = MEM_NO) JOIN ADOPT_REVIEW ON (CONTENT_NO = ARLIST_NO) WHERE REPORT_NO = ?

SELECT REPORT_NO , CONTENT_NO , M.MEM_ID "MEM_ID" , REPORT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') REPORT_DATE , REPORT_STATUS , REPORT_CTG , DSP_TITLE , ANIMAL_ISSUE , ETC , POST_STATUS FROM REPORTED JOIN MEM_INFO M ON (REPORTED_MEM = M.MEM_NO) JOIN DSP ON (CONTENT_NO = DSP_NO) WHERE REPORT_NO = ?

SELECT REPORT_NO , CONTENT_NO , M.MEM_ID "MEM_ID" , REPORT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') REPORT_DATE , REPORT_STATUS , REPORT_CTG , REPLY_CONTENT , REPLY_STATUS FROM REPORTED JOIN MEM_INFO M ON (REPORTED_MEM = M.MEM_NO) JOIN REPLY ON (CONTENT_NO = REPLY_NO) WHERE REPORT_NO = ?

SELECT REPORTED_MEM , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , BLACKLIST_YN , COUNT(*) count FROM REPORTED JOIN MEM_INFO ON (MEM_NO = REPORTED_MEM) WHERE REPORT_STATUS = 'Y' AND BLACKLIST_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , REPORTED_MEM , BLACKLIST_YN
UPDATE ADOPT_REVIEW SET POST_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE ARLIST_NO = ?
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
UPDATE DSP SET POST_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE DSP_NO = ?
UPDATE MEM_INFO SET BLACKLIST_YN = 'Y' , BLACK_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_NO = ?

INSERT INTO REPORTED ( REPORT_NO , CONTENT_NO , REPORTING_MEM , REPORTED_MEM , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_STATUS , REPORT_CTG , TYPE_BR ) VALUES ( LPAD(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL,3,0) , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'N' , ? , ? )

INSERT INTO REPORTED ( REPORT_NO , CONTENT_NO , REPORTING_MEM , REPORTED_MEM , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_STATUS , REPORT_CTG , TYPE_BR ) VALUES ( LPAD(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL,3,0) , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'N' , ? , ? )
SELECT TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "WRITE_DATE" FROM (SELECT REPORT_DATE FROM REPORTED WHERE REPORT_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM = 1
